options.name: Apprentice Chef
options.description: You have learned the fundamentals of cooking and food preparation. Gain +1 skill with cooking.

options.name: Tastetester
options.description: Not only are you an aspiring cook, you also have a keen sense of taste and smell. Gain +1 skill with senses. You can automatically detect when food or drink has been modified, such as when it has been poisoned or modified magically.

options.name: Reinforced Food
options.description: Meals you make grant an additional 2 temporary health. When someone eats a meal you made, they get credit for a full rest, regardless of the sleeping conditions and they gain an extra health for completing it.

options.name: Knife Tricks
options.description: Your time in the kitchen has made you a bit of a showoff. Gain +1 skill with coordination and +1 skill with expression.

options.name: Reaction : Trusty Pan
options.description: In response to making a deflection check, use your pan to help ward off an attack adding a 1d12 into your deflection dice pool.

options.name: Skilled Chef
options.description: Your cooking skills have reached professional levels. Gain +1 skill with cooking. When making cooking checks, any roll under a 4 becomes a 3.

options.name: Comfort Food
options.description: Your snacks are so good they make troubling times bearable. You gain +1 maximum resolve. When a character eats one of your snacks, any damage they take from psychic damage is halved until the end of their next full rest.

options.name: Nutritionist
options.description: You practice healthy and clean eating. You gain +1 skill with medicine and +1 health. When someone eats a meal you made, they regenerate an extra resolve at the end of a full rest.

options.name: Legendary Chef
options.description: You have achieved mastery over the culinary arts. Gain +1 talent and +1 skill with cooking. When making cooking checks, any roll under a 6 becomes a 5.
